title.en: Kami-sama ga Koi wo shiro to Itte iru!

altTitles.en: God is Telling Me to Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: 神様が恋をしろと言っている！

altTitles.zh-hk: 神明大人对我说快去恋爱吧

description.en: Chiyoko, in her second year of high school, transfers to a co-ed school due to her dad's job transfer. Since she's only attended an all-girls school since junior high, she excitedly plans to fall in love in her new school. Out of the blue, she begins to see the love meters of 5 hotties and an options window as if she were in an otome game?! She encounters various types such as a glasses boy, a playboy underclassman, and a mysterious senior. Meet-cutes with boys come one after another. This is the beginning of a real otome game school life!

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ja: 人類の守護者・竜神戦隊ドラゴンキーパーVS.世界征服を企む悪の軍団・怪人。彼らは互いの存亡を懸け、死闘を繰り広げ続けている！！……というのは、やらせの茶番劇。他の星から侵略してきた怪人達は、わずか１年で屈服。民衆の前で敗北を演じ続ける道化と化していた！悪者にすらなれず、隷従させられ続ける日々。そんな状況を覆すべく、一人の怪人が最強の大戦隊を相手に反旗を翻す！
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.th: รักใสๆ ของยอนอู

description.en:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---

여학생으로 오해받을 정도로 여리여리한 외모를 가진 연우. 
그는 교내 인기스타인 강해솔을 몰래 좋아하고 있다.
하지만 낯을 굉장히 많이 가리고 소심한 연우는 같은 반인 해솔이에게 말 한 번 붙여본 적 없는데…

description.zh:
纯情小白恋上高冷万人迷，
青涩的他能否勇敢追爱？
长相秀气，以至于经常被误认为是女孩子的延禹，正在暗恋同校的万人迷蒋晗抒。然而极其认生，性格怯懦的延禹还从未跟同班的晗抒说过话…在各种同学的助攻下，延禹能否鼓起勇气，勇敢追爱呢？

description.pt-br: Yeonwoo possui uma aparência tão delicada que poderia ser confundido com uma aluna. No entanto, ele tem uma paixão secreta pelo ídolo da escola, Kang Haesol. Mas o tímido Yeonwoo nunca disse uma palavra a ela...

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Slow Life wo Enjoy Shitai! ~Yatto Konyaku Hakisareta no ni, Daini Ouji ga Meccha Stalker Shitekurun desu kedo~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢はスローライフをエンジョイしたい！～やっと婚約破棄されたのに、第二王子がめっちゃストーカーしてくるんですけど…～

altTitles.vi: Nữ Phản Diện Muốn Tận Hưởng Cuộc Sống Nhàn Nhã! - Vừa Bị Huỷ Hôn, Nhưng Thái Tử Thứ Hai Lại Liên Tục Đeo Bám Tôi

description.en:
"I break off my engagement to you!"

The crown prince threw this line at Sylvie at the school's graduation ceremony, and the villainous daughter Sylvie smiled with satisfaction. With a smile on her face, she says, "Yes! I will gladly accept! I will gladly accept!" She was accused of bullying the Dauphin's girlfriend, but she debunked the allegation with a brilliant alibi: "I was digging radishes in the dungeon." With the fee she had collected and her S-class adventurer's license in hand, Sylvie moved comfortably to a farm.

She is ready to start living the slow life she has dreamed of for so long! But then, the second prince, the brother of her former fiancé, arrives on the scene! It seems that he sees Sylvie as a dangerous person who is avenging the royal family, and he often stays in the house to watch over her...
description.ja:
「やっと来たのね、婚約破棄（待望）の瞬間が…」
「そなたとの婚約は破棄する!」

学園の卒業式で王太子からお約束の台詞を投げつけられた悪役令嬢シルヴィ。彼女は会心の笑みで……「はい! 喜んでお受けします!」と答えた。王太子の恋人へのいじめ疑惑をかけられるも、「ダンジョンで大根を掘っていた」という華麗なアリバイで論破。ふんだくった慰謝料とS級冒険者のライセンスを片手に、シルヴィはとある農場へ悠々と移住する。

かねてからの夢だったスローライフを始めよう! と思いきや、かつての婚約者の弟である第二王子が押し掛けてきた!? どうやらシルヴィを王家に仇なす危険人物として見ているらしく、監視と称してたびたび居座るようになり!?
description.vi: Khoảnh khắc chờ đợi từ lâu để chấm dứt hôn ước cuối cùng đã đến..." "Ta tuyên bố  hủy bỏ hôn ước với cô!" Tại lễ tốt nghiệp của học viện, Silvia, nữ phản diện, được thái tử tuyên bố hủy bỏ hôn ước. Cô trả lời với một nụ cười chân thành... "Tôi xin trân trọng nhận lời" Cô bị buộc tội bắt nạt bạn gái của thái tử, nhưng cô bác bỏ với một chứng cứ tuyệt vời rằng cô đang "đào củ cải trong dungeon." Với phần thưởng hậu hĩnh và giấy phép mạo hiểm giá cấp S, Silvia chuyển đến một trang trại. Khi cô đang nghĩ đến việc bắt đầu cuộc sống chậm rãi mà cô luôn mơ ước, em trai của vị hôn phu cũ, thái tử thứ hai, đã đến! Dường như anh ta coi Silvie là một người nguy hiểm đối với hoàng gia và thường xuyên ở đó dưới danh nghĩa giám sát cô!

description.ar: قصر فاخر في أفضل مكان بطوكيو. يعيشُ سبعة أشقاء من عائلة شيونجي، وجميعهم جميلونَ للغاية. ونرى مغامرة أراتا العائلية بين صراع إيجاد الذات والوصول إلى أهدافهِ كونهُ الابن الأكبر للعائلة
description.en: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won’t stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata’s world off its axis...
description.ja: 世田谷の豪邸に住む紫雲寺家の７人兄弟姉妹は、才色兼備で巷でもその名を轟かせている。長男の新は、個性の強い５人の姉妹に振り回されながらも家族を大切にして過ごしてきた。しかし、末の妹の誕生日会で父親から驚きの事実を告げられ、兄弟姉妹の運命は一変する―!?
description.pt-br: O amor entre irmão e irmã. O amor entre homem e mulher. Aquilo que é mais proibido é mais inabalável. Os dois filhos e as cinco filhas da família Shiunji brilham como pedras preciosas, cada um com inteligência e beleza incoparáveis. E com o pedigree de seu rico pai por trás deles, como poderiam não ser o assunto da cidade? O filho mais velho, Arata, passou a vida sendo infernizado pelos caprichos de suas deslumbrantes irmãs, mas nenhuma  provocação iria o impedir de valorizar sua família acima de tudo e de todos. Mas quando sua irmã mais nova completa quinze anos, seu pai revela um segredo há muito escondido dos "irmãos" Shiunji e vira o mundo de Arata de cabeça para baixo...

description.en:
Since the old days, mystical creatures have existed to help humans. However, now that the times have changed, they suddenly receive a warning from their god: "Prove that you are still needed".

While grappling with how they can assist humans in the modern era, these creatures decide to send their younglings to the human world to seek answers.

Meanwhile, university student Park Geuru, who lives his miserable days commuting for five hours to school due to a sudden move, accidentally ends up making a bet with the goblin Sihan... 

This is a story about the daily life of these young mystical creatures, exploring the human world in order to avoid their own extinction.

Molly, a cute 13-year-old girl, has been bullied by ruffians ever since she was little. Determined never to be harassed again, she gets herself into an elite school – a place free from hooligans and gangsters, or so she thinks! It isn't long before she finds herself the lackey of a mysterious boy in black – a gangster belonging to a pre-eminent gang in the underworld! An action-packed tale peppered with budding romance...
description.uk: Моллі, мила 13-річна дівчинка, яка з дитинства зазнавала знущань з боку хуліганів. Вирішивши ніколи більше не бути переслідуваною, вона потрапляє в елітну школу – місце, вільне від хуліганів і гангстерів, принаймні їй так здається! Невдовзі вона стає слугою таємничого хлопця в чорному – гангстера, який належить до видатної банди злочинного світу! Наповнена гострим сюжетом історія, приправлена романтикою...

title.en: Douyara Watashi no Karada wa Kanzen Muteki no You Desu ne

altTitles.ja: どうやら私の身体は完全無敵のようですね

altTitles.en: It Seems My Body Is Completely Invincible

description.en:
On her deathbed, a sickly young girl wishes to be reborn with a strong body that will never succumb to anyone or anything. Lo and behold, her wish is granted! Upon reincarnating into another world as Mary Regalia, she discovers her new body has maxed-out attributes, from physical strength to defense—even magic. But wait! That isn’t what she really wanted! All she longed for was a normal life. Baffled by God’s choice to grant her wish in this most unexpected way, Mary tries to spend her days as uneventfully as possible. The hitch is...nothing’s harder than living a normal life when you’re absolutely invincible!

---
   **Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3881dn/) (Raw)
 - **[** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FS01200196010000_68/) **|** [NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/32810) **]** (Raw)

It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked. 

"I'll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"
description.ja: タカミチは魔界に転生して10年。魔界最強の大魔剣士で次期魔王の座すら譲られるほどになっていた…が、悩んでいた。女性との行為によって強くなる『インキュバス』のスキルツリーは既に行き詰まっていたのだ。インキュバスのスキルツリーを解き明かすため、意を決してゲートをくぐるタカミチを待っていたのは…薬師の美少女アウラや魔眼の暗殺者バイオレットとの…エッロすぎる出会いだった（笑）
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

description.en:
Hibari Otaka, whose hobby is to have a bath in such wild hot springs, travels alone around the country to visit them! You'll be fascinated by the unknown world of wild hot springs!

 (Source: Shogakukan, translated)
description.ja: 「野湯」＜のゆ＞。それは、大自然の中に人知れず湧き出している天然の温泉。そんな野湯を愛してやまないヒロイン・大鷹ヒバリは、今日も山を越え、森をかき分け、時には海さえ渡りながら、日本中の野湯を目指して進み続ける。すべては大自然の試練を超えた先にある、極上の開放感に浴するために―――！

title.en: The Immoral Duke Needs to be Homeschooled

altTitles.en: Immoral Duke's Family Needs to be Homeschooled

description.en:
You three kids, I’ll teach you.

Recently, there have been several changes in my life.

The first is that I became the governess of Lord Bertha’s siblings, and the second is that I remembered my past life. 

Why did I recall my past life now? Could this be inside the novel I read in my past life? 

If I remember correctly, I, “Estella,” the governess, will soon die. All to protect the half-siblings from that immoral man, “Diego”! 

“You seem like a more capable person than I thought.” 
“You’d better look for a job at another estate because you’ll go crazy if you stay here.” 

But “Diego,” the man who I thought was a heartless psychopath, turns out to be surprisingly kind…? 

Alright, I’m going to organize a dramatic reconciliation between Diego and his half-siblings!! How could you possibly kill these adorable kids when they’re hugging you?!

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

description.en:
Allie Abel, a girl who came from the countryside wishing to become a witch who can make people happy with magic, meets Yoshino-York, an unusual witch who sells ordinary flowers and believes that "people can be happy without relying on magic". Allie, who has been assigned to work at Yoshino's florist as an apprentice witch, is now making "happiness" that was supposed to come true through magic come true with her own hands...?　

A heroine fantasy of flowers and magic that will bring a little smile to your face!

Based on a wealth of research, the book examines the life of Mao Zedong, the bright star who laid the foundation of today's China. The young Mao Zedong, who carried the banner of revolution through an era of upheaval, is depicted with images of unusual power with distinctive penmanship from Fujiko A, better known for his work in boys comics.

In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.en: Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku

altTitles.id: Cinta itu Sulit untuk Seorang Otaku

altTitles.es: Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku

altTitles.pl: Wotakoi. Miłość jest trudna dla otaku

altTitles.pt-br: Wotakoi: O amor é difícil para otakus

altTitles.th: ยากแท้จริงหนอรักของโอตาคุ

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

altTitles.vi: Đôi Mèo Song Hành - Maruru và Hachi

altTitles.ja: ツレ猫　マルルとハチ

description.en: House cat Maruru is in a bad situation: after chasing after crows he cannot find his way back home. Thus start his life as a stray cat, partnering up with fellow stray Hachiware.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện kể về "Maruru và Hachi", những chú mèo đã trở thành mèo hoang sau khi rời bỏ chủ nhân vì vài lí do.

Vì vài lí do nào đó, Maruru đã rời bỏ chủ nhân và trở thành mèo hoang. Rồi gặp được Hachi, một chú mèo đực khác với quả mắt chán đời (?), và cả hai bắt đầu đi dạo cùng nhau -- song đời thì lại không đơn giản đến thế. Đây là câu chuyện kể về những chú mèo hoang (và những con người xung quanh chúng) sống sót trong thế giới khắc nghiệt này. Một bộ truyện kể về chú mèo hài hước và dễ thương song hành cùng một chú mèo khó tính!
description.pt-br: O gato doméstico Maruru está em uma situação complicada: depois de perseguir corvos, ele não consegue encontrar o caminho de volta para casa. Assim, comece sua vida como um gato de rua, fazendo parceria com o colega de rua Hachiware.

title.en: Shokugyou wa Kanteishi Desu ga [Shingan] tte Nandesu ka? ~Sekai Saikou no Shokyuushoku de Jiyuu ni Ikitai~

altTitles.ja: 職業は鑑定士ですが【神眼】ってなんですか？～世界最高の初級職で自由にいきたい～

altTitles.en: My Job is Appraiser, but What is The [God Eye]? Living Freely with The World's Greatest Elementary Level Job

description.en: Touri, a High schooler who was Transported to another World, was immediately banished due to his Elementary Level Job, 'Appraiser'. But there's more to his Job...!?
description.ja: 平凡な高校生だった真広桃李はある日の授業中、クラス全員で異世界へ転移してしまう。転移先ですぐさま職業を聞かれるが、判明したのは初級職でしかない『鑑定士』だった！勇者を求めて召喚した人々に流されるまま追放されてしまうトウリだったが、彼の職業には続きがあって……!?

title.en: Tales of Demons and Gods (Webtoon Version)
Dragon King’s Palace: The Richest Son-in-Law

altTitles.zh-ro: Zuì Háo Zhùi Xù Lóng Wáng Diàn

altTitles.en: The Most Luxurious Son-in-Law: Dragon King's Palace

altTitles.vi: Long Vương Điện: Người Ở Rể Giàu Nhất

description.en: I am nothing in the eyes of others; my mother-in-law despises me, thinking I just rely on my wife and spend her money. And then there’s a group of lowlifes who are constantly coveting my wife. Who says a man marrying into his wife’s family can’t rise to greatness? Ji Xueyu! From now on, I’ll be the one to protect you
description.vi: Ta chẳng là gì trong mắt người khác, mẹ vợ khinh thường vì nghĩ ta ăn bám vợ, tiêu tiền của vợ. Ngoài ra còn có một lũ cặn bã luôn thèm muốn vợ ta. Ai nói là vào cửa nhà vợ thì không thể bay lên 9 tầng mây? Kỷ Tuyết Vũ! Sau này sẽ do ta bảo vệ em

title.en: Class no Bocchi Gal wo Omochikaeri Shite Seisokei Bijin ni Shite Yatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: クラスのぼっちギャルをお持ち帰りして清楚系美人にしてやった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Bocchi Gyaru o Omochikaeri shite Seisokei Bijin ni shiteyatta Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story of Taking Home a Lonely Gal from My Class and Turning Her into an Elegant Beauty

altTitles.zh: 收留孤身一人的同班辣妹，并使之化身清纯美女

altTitles.zh-ro: Shōuliú gūshēn yīrén de tóngbān làmèi, bìng shǐ zhī huàshēn qīngchún měinǚ

description.en: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. "...I don't have a home anymore." Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn't leave a girl alone, so he took her home. "Thanks for the help." "I-It's fine..." When Akira heard about Aoi's complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
description.ja:
来年転校を控えている高校生の明護晃はある雨の日、近所の公園でずぶ濡れになっている金髪ギャルのクラスメイト、五月女葵を見かける。

「……私、帰る家がないの」

どう見てもワケアリの葵を放っておけず、自宅に連れ帰るのだが――

「お風呂、ありがとう」
「お、おう……」

葵の抱える複雑な事情を聞いた晃は人助けだと思い、転校までの間、そのまま一緒に生活をすることに。はじめて尽くしの同居生活に戸惑いながらも、二人はゆっくりと心の距離を近づけていき――。これは、出会いと別れを繰り返す二人の恋物語（ラブストーリー）。
description.vi: Vào một ngày mưa tầm tả, Akira Akamori, là học sinh trung học chỉ sống một mình. Vô tình nhìn thấy Aoi Soutome, cô gái tóc vàng bạn cùng lớp đang ướt sũng trong công viên gần đó. “... Tôi không có nhà để về" "Nhìn thế nào đi nữa, tôi cũng không thể bỏ rơi Aoi Soutome “ Sau khi biết về hoàn cảnh của cô ấy, tôi quyết định để cô ấy sống chung cùng với mình.
description.pt-br: Uma vez ele ajudou uma garota da sua sala. Em uma tarde chuvosa, Akira Akamori, um colegial que acabou de mudar para uma nova escola, viu sua colega de sala loira, encharcada pela chuva em uma praça por perto. “… eu não tenho mais aonde morar.” Apesar da Aoi ser uma completa estranha para ele, ele não pode deixar a garota sozinha, então a levou para sua casa. “Obrigada pela ajuda.” “E-está tudo bem…”

description.en:
People become primal beasts, give up rational thought, and celebrate their freedom in anonymity.

This is the "Masked City."

It is a town where anyone can casually transform into a beast by taking a "monster supplement" and do whatever they want. It is the only government-approved "slum" where one can forget the stifling atmosphere of a completely monitored society. In this town, a vampire boy named Zero, who was a real monster, and his werewolf partner Tsuki take on the job of "exterminating vermin" as street cleaners. They search for hit-and-run centaurs, hunt JK bunnies, and fight to the death against an urban legend that has emerged. An encounter with the "Medicine Witch" will change the destiny of Zero and his friends.

(Source: Dengeki Bunko, translated)

Yuuto is an ordinary high school boy who, one day, notices a mysterious tarot card by his bed. He shows it to his parents, who give him the good news - as the son of demonking, he is eligible to become the next Demon Lord. As such, Yuuto is soon brought to a demonic academy in order to improve his devilish skills and earn the title of demon lord. And, you know, get a harem along the way.
description.ja: 人間が悪魔に虐げられる世界で、奇しくも【次期魔王候補】に選ばれた“人間”の男子高校生・盛岡雄斗。最底辺に属す“人間”の男が、全知全能＆ハーレムチートを手に入れ、魔の頂きに成り上がる！
description.pt-br: "A humanidade é nada mais que escrava para uma raça demoníaca - Um estudante comum do ensino médio, Morioka Yuuto, foi escolhido para ser candidato ao próximo rei demônio. Ele é transferido para o colégio Ginsei, aonde é tratado com desdenho pelos outros estudantes. [Juro que vou te fazer ser rei demônio. Por isso... me torne a sua serva!] Yuuto se encontra com uma linda demônio, Himegami Lizel, que muda o seu mundo e sua vida. Ele pode aprender qualquer tipo de magia instantaneamente e absorver poder mágico infinitamente ao ter contato com suas servas. Esse é um poder especial que os demônios não tinham e era concedida a apenas a um humano, Yuuto. O humano que se tornou candidato a rei demônio e desafiou os mais fortes demônios para ser o próximo rei! Emocionante e fascinante. A fantástica história de ascensão em um colégio de magia se inicia!"

altTitles.ja: くらいあの子としたいこと

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurai Ano Ko to Shitai Koto

altTitles.en: What I’d Like to Do with That Gloomy Girl

altTitles.zh: 想与阴暗的她一起做的事

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng yǔ yīn'àn de tā yīqǐ zuò de shì

altTitles.id: Apa yang inginku lakukan dengan gadis yang murung itu?

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng u ám cùng lớp của tôi

description.en: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it!
description.ja: 新学期から脱ぼっちを目指す高校2年生・田端蓮。友達の為に最初に声をかけたのは、なんだか暗くてちょっぴり怖い。でも目が離せない女の子、佐々木透子で。。。。
description.pt-br: A garota sombria é linda!  Uma romcom escolar sobre uma garota fofa e tímida e um garoto que quer fazer amigos!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

altTitles.tr: Lütfen Bana Zorbalık Yap, Kötü Hanım!

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.tr: Ben, Yvonne, bir Otome oyununda zengin kötü karakter olarak reenkarne oldum. Oyunun hikayesine göre benim gibi herkesin nefret ettiği bir karakter, ana karaktere zorbalık yapmak, onu hoşlanabileceği çeşitli karakterlerin romantik rotalarına sürüklemek gibi bir ana göreve sahip. Ama görünen o ki Elsa’da bir gariplik var, kahraman! Benimle fazla yakınlaşıyor!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.pl: Kaoru i Rin. Rozkwitając z tobą

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Au cœur d'une banlieue japonaise, se dressent face à face deux établissements que tout oppose : Chidori, le lycée public pour garçons, réunit les pires cancres de la ville, tandis que le prestigieux Kikyô rassemble les esprits les plus brillants des filles de bonne famille.

Donnant régulièrement un coup de main à la pâtisserie familiale, Rintarô Tsumugi, élève à Chidori, sympathise avec l'une de ses clientes régulières, Kaoruko Waguri. Alors qu'il sent peu à peu un lien se tisser entre eux, le lycéen apprend que la jeune fille fréquente Kikyô et que comme tous les élèves de ces établissements, ils sont supposés se haïr mutuellement ! La rivalité entre leurs lycées est-elle forcément signe de fatalité ?
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
description.ja: おもちゃの企画開発会社でグラフィックデザイナーをしている柴田かさね（しばたかさね）は、あることで悩んでいた。悩みの発端は、思いがけない事故で同僚の榎田昴（えのきだすばる）のお尻を触ってしまったこと…！ 榎田のお尻の感触が、かさねの大好きなキャラクターの着ぐるみの感触と似ていて興味を持った。けれど、それと同時に、榎田に嫌な思いをさせてしまったんじゃないかという罪悪感が拭えない。榎田は「気にしてない」と言ったけれど、その表情はどこか怯えて苦しそうで…。もっと、きちんと謝らなければ！と強く思うかさね。一方で、榎田にはある隠し事があって――。
description.ru: Касанэ Сибата работает графическим дизайнером в компании, выпускающей детские игрушки. Однажды она случайно... дотронулась до ягодиц своего коллеги, Субару Энокиды, и это напомнило ей о любимом персонаже из детства. Касанэ хочет извиниться перед Субару, не подозревая, что он скрывает...

title.en: Zense de Aishita Hime ga Tensei Shitara Oji-san deshita

altTitles.ja: 前世で愛した姫が転生したらおじさんでした

altTitles.en: The Princess I Loved in My Past Life is Now a Middle-Aged Dad

description.en: A princess and a knight who loved each other but could not be united. They vowed to meet again in the next life, and were reborn. The knight Bartolomeo has been searching for his beloved Princess Claudia for 17 years. When he finally finds her, she has turned into an old man.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

A world where the twelve factions of the God tribe fight and exist together in.

The nature faction's Larte, who worked for the carnivorous faction and got abused, was an offering for the predators but saved by the hero Tasire.

Based on Tasire’s words, Larte was an existence that was born once in a thousand years to fight against the predators, and fated to be the leader of the God tribe.

After training with Tasire, he’s now ready to start his revenge by turning the world upside down.
description.ko:
12계열의 갓트(GOD-Tribe)가 서로 싸우며 공존하는 세상.
육식계에게 학대를 받으며 일하던 환식계 꼬마 랏데는
포식자에 제물로 바쳐졌으나, 영웅 타세르에 의해 구원된다.
타세르의 말에 따르면 랏데가 바로 포식자들에 맞서 세상을 구원할
천년에 한번 태어나는 계시된 존재였고,
이후 모든 '갓트'집단의 리더가 될 운명이었다.
이제 타세르와의 수련 후, 세상을 뒤집는 복수가 시작된다.
description.ru: В мире, состоящем из двенадцати фракций племени богов, которые находятся в постоянном противостоянии, представитель группировки собирателей Ларте пал их жертвой, однако был чудесным образом спасён великим героем Тасире. По его словам, Ларте — существо, которое рождается раз в тысячу лет для борьбы с хищниками, и именно ему суждено стать лидером «племени богов». После обучения у Тасире юноша готов отомстить своим врагам за все причинённые страдания, даже если ему понадобится для этого перевернуть весь мир с ног на голову.

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With the Older Girl Next Door
I Love The Older Girl Next Door.

altTitles.pt-br: Eu amo a garota mais velha da casa ao lado.

description.en: There's this beautiful, bubbly, film-loving girl who's three years older than me: her name's Shia, and she lives right next door! I'm madly in love with her, and I needed some way to see her! I settled on asking her for movie recommendations, and now I get to meet her every Wednesday! I want to know more about her, and tell her how I feel... but I just can't get the message across! Enjoy this lopsided rom-com brought to you by the author of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses" and "Paper Braver", Koume Fujichika!
description.pt-br:
**Minha Vizinha Cinéfila**

Tem essa garota linda, super animada e apaixonada por filmes que mora bem ao lado: o nome dela é Shia, e ela é três anos mais velha que eu! Sou completamente apaixonado por ela, e precisava de um jeito de vê-la! Decidi pedir recomendações de filmes, e agora a encontro toda quarta-feira! Quero saber mais sobre ela e contar o que sinto... mas simplesmente não consigo me expressar! Curta essa comédia romântica desequilibrada do mesmo autor de "A Garota de Quem Gosto Esqueceu os Óculos" e "Paper Braver".

description.en: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

title.en: Maigo Kyuujo wa Ryuu no Miko no Okiniiri Ryuukakoku Koukyuu Jikenchou

altTitles.ja: 迷子宮女は龍の御子のお気に入り ～龍華国後宮事件帳～

description.es-la:
¡Un romance misterioso entre una doncella novata y un apuesto eunuco! Desde una edad temprana, Rinka ha sido burlada y maltratada por los aldeanos debido a su extraña habilidad ocular. Su única fuente de apoyo ha sido su hermana, la única que la comprendía. Sin embargo, un día, su hermana desaparece misteriosamente del Palacio Interior donde trabajaba.

Rinka se convierte en una doncella del Palacio Interior del Reino Ryuka para buscar a su hermana, pero pasa los días sin pistas. Un día, Rinka se encuentra con el apuesto eunuco Kouren, envuelto en la luz plateada. ¿Qué misterioso romance se desencadenará en este Palacio Interior?

description.en: High schooler Minorikawa Narumi becomes an orphan after losing his mother. One day, his grandfather who he never knew comes to offer incense and shares he’d like Narumi to take over the company he is managing. However the company he’s talking about ends up being a yakuza organization..!? Suddenly addressed as “Bocchan,” the once lonely Narumi begins to gradually open his heart up to the kind Wakagashira, Ioroi, who is in charge of his daily needs. In fact, as they spend every day close together, Narumi becomes obsessed with the “charm of an adult man,” that he awakens to for the first time in his life. Every day, he strives to appeal to Ioroi, but---!?

Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
description.ko:
미친놈인가?
아니면 흔한 관심종자인가?

사람의 다름을 이해 못 하는 제자 이강진.
그리고 그걸 이해시켜주고자 하는 스승 곽노.
두 사제師弟의 따뜻한 휴먼스토리.

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa" has made three best friends in her monthly meetup group, where girls get together every month by meeting up at the cutest and trendiest new dessert cafes. Cocoa is in it for the sweets—really!—but she's also harboring a few secrets: Not only does Cocoa have a crush on another one of the girls in the group, Opera, but she's actually a guy named Satoshi who's been cross-dressing! During one meetup, things come to a head when Opera discovers that Cocoa is cross-dressing—and to Cocoa's surprise, Opera confesses that she is too! [Kodansha]

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
description.ja: 人生で自分にとっての「一番」をずっと心にしまい続けながら、チョコレート工場での仕事を続ける一好瑛太。クリスマスの夜、帰宅中の彼は暗闇から転がる不思議なスーパーボールを手にする。日常への様々な思いをぶつけるように、そのボールを思い切り投げつけた彼の前にいきなり現れたのは理想の「美女」．．．！？
description.pt-br: Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma fábrica de chocolate, trancando o seu "melhor" em seu coração. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escuridão...

description.en:
This manhwa contains animal death(sheep). Viewer discretion is advised. 

**“Even if you’re here, nobody will welcome you!”**

5 years ago I left my home for the city. 
Mihail, who wandered around without no one to rely on, fails to settle down and eventually returns to his hometown. Which is a remote mountain valley rural village where even carts do not take you all the way. As soon as he arrived, he went back to the cabin of his one and only childhood friend, the shepherd, Caleb. He greeted him warmly, but all he got back were words demanding he leave immediately. Mihail tries to change Caleb's mind so that he can get along well in his hometown. Although, things don't go as easily as expected..

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

altTitles.es-la: Creo que he transmigrado en alguna novela

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.ja:
「オレはただ…静かに過ごしたいだけなのに――…」

両親の転勤のおかげで念願の一人暮らしをはじめた高校生・陽高旭。孤独を愛する彼は学校でもトイレで一人ぼっちメシをキメていた。しかし、ささやかな平穏はひとりの少女…月峰千夜によって破られる。どこからともなく旭の元へ現れる千夜は彼の気弱さにつけこみ無茶を要求してきて!?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

title.en: Boukenka ni Narou! Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku

altTitles.en: CALL TO ADVENTURE! Defeating Dungeons with a Skill Board

altTitles.ja-ro: Bouken-ka ni Narou! ~ Sukiruboodo de Danjon Kouryaku ~
Boukenka ni Narou! ~Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku~

altTitles.en: Become an Adventurer! ~Defeating Dungeons with a Skillboard~

altTitles.ru: Стать авантюристом! ~ Как пройти подземелье с помощью панели навыков ~

altTitles.ja: 冒険家になろう! ~スキルボードでダンジョン攻略~

altTitles.ja-ro: Bouken-ka ni Narou! ~Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku~

altTitles.zh-hk: 成為冒險家吧！ ~ 用技能面板攻略地下城 ~

altTitles.zh: 成为冒险家吧！ ～用技能面板攻略地下城 ~

altTitles.ja-ro: Bōken-ka ni Narou! ~ Skillboard de Dungeon Kōryaku ~

altTitles.en: Let's Be an Adventurer! ~Defeating Dungeons with a Skill Board~

description.en:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.
description.ru: У Карабоши Харуки нет ничего, что выделяло бы его из толпы, и поэтому он решил стать авантюристом, желая "отличиться". Однажды под его домом на Хоккайдо появилось подземелье. По случайному совпадению, он нашёл так называемую "панель навыков", в которой он может распределять специальные очки для увеличения скорости прокачки. Сможет ли Харуки стать популярным человеком, одержимо посещая своё "домашнее подземелье" каждый день?
description.pt-br:
Karaboshi Haruki não tem presença, tanto quanto pode ser reconhecido, então ele se tornou um aventureiro com apenas o desejo de "se destacar". Um dia, uma masmorra apareceu sob sua casa em Hokkaido. Coincidentemente, ele pegou um "Skill Board" com o qual pode gastar pontos de habilidade para aumentar sua taxa de crescimento. É possível se tornar uma pessoa popular mergulhando obsessivamente na masmorra de sua casa todos os dias?
  
Baseado no popular romance de fantasia Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer", vencedor do 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.vi: Câu Lạc Bộ Tra Tấn Của Các Nữ Sinh Sau Giờ Học

description.en:
After years of being unlucky with girls, Ishimaru Daito only wishes to enjoy his high school life with a normal, cute girlfriend. However, after losing a game to his two new seniors Sasahara Kiyoka and Tomochika Asami, he is forced to join the <Humanism Studies> club which is actually a torture studies club. Will Ishimaru get the normal high school life he always wanted?  
  


---
description.pt: Depois de anos de azar com as garotas, Ishimaru Daito só quer aproveitar a vida no colegial com uma namorada normal e bonita. No entanto, depois de perder um jogo contra suas duas novas senpais, Sasahara Kiyoka e Tomochika Asami, ele é forçado a ingressar no clube de "estudos humanísticos", que na verdade é um clube de estudos sobre tortura. Ishimaru será capaz de alcançar a vida normal do ensino médio que ele sempre quis?
description.vi: Sau nhiều năm đen đủi với các cô gái, Ishimaru Daito chỉ mong được tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung của mình bên một cô bạn gái bình thường và dễ thương. Tuy nhiên, sau khi thua một trò chơi trước hai tiền bối mới của mình là Sasahara Kiyoka và Tomochika Asami, cậu buộc phải tham gia câu lạc bộ <Nghiên Cứu Chủ Nghĩa Nhân Văn> thực chất lại là một câu lạc bộ Nghiên Cứu Tra Tấn. Liệu Ishimaru có được cuộc sống cao trung bình thường mà cậu hằng mong muốn?
description.pt-br: Depois de anos de azar com as garotas, Ishimaru Daito só quer aproveitar a vida no colegial com uma namorada normal e bonita. No entanto, depois de perder um jogo contra suas duas novas senpais, Sasahara Kiyoka e Tomochika Asami, ele é forçado a ingressar no clube de “estudos humanísticos”, que na verdade é um clube de estudos sobre tortura. Ishimaru será capaz de alcançar a vida normal do ensino médio que ele sempre quis?

description.en: Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

title.en: Chronicles of Narnia: The Magician's Nephew

altTitles.ja: ナルニア国物語: 魔術師のおい

altTitles.ja-ro: Narnia Koku Monogatari: Majutsushi no Oi

altTitles.fr: Le Monde de Narnia : Le Neveu du magicien

description.en: On a daring quest to save a life, two friends are hurled into another world, where an evil sorceress seeks to enslave them. But then the lion Aslan's song weaves itself into the fabric of a new land, a land that will be known as Narnia. And in Narnia, all things are possible.
description.fr: Dans une quête audacieuse pour sauver une vie, deux amis sont projetés dans un autre monde, où une sorcière maléfique cherche à les asservir. Mais alors, le chant du lion Aslan se tisse dans le tissu d'une nouvelle terre, une terre qui sera connue sous le nom de Narnia. Et à Narnia, tout devient possible.

title.en: Intai Shita Ossan Kenja da ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Slow Life na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natteita~

altTitles.ja: 引退したおっさん賢者だが愛弟子が追放されてきたので傷心旅行に連れて行く ～スローライフな旅のつもりが、なぜか世界最強の師弟になっていた〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Intaishita Ossan Kenjada ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Surouraifu na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natte Ita~

altTitles.en: A Retired Old Sage Takes His Disciple on a Journey

He Is a Retired Old Sage, but His Beloved Disciple Has Been Expelled, So He Takes Her on a Heartbreak Trip ~He Intended to Travel in a Slow Life Fashion, but for Some Reason He Ended Up Becoming the World's Strongest Master and Disciple.~

altTitles.id: Seorang Sage Tua Yang Sudah Pensiun Mengajak Muridnya Dalam Sebuah Perjalanan

description.en:
"Shall we go on an adventure, like in the old days?"

Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenly came to visit him. 

"Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled." 

Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. 

"Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!" 

And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…
